Because of family issues she develops an interest in her brother Seiji and later tries to get rid of Selty`s head after her brother falls in love with it. She also persuades Mika into a plastic surgery to replace her deformed face with that of Selty`s and later attempts to erase her memory. Following Mika`s escape she and her followers are defeated by Mikado and the Dollars, whom Mika turned to. And Namie, left without any other choice, starts working under Izaya.

character.name: Kadota Kyouhei
character.description: Kadota Kyouhei is friends with http://anidb.net/ch13869 [Karisawa], http://anidb.net/ch13870 [Yumasaki] and http://anidb.net/ch14866 [Togusa]. The quartet always hangs out together and were formerly part of http://anidb.net/ch14887 [Blue Squares] and now http://anidb.net/ch14864 [Dollars]. It was them who saved http://anidb.net/ch14873 [Saki] from the clutches of the Blue Squares.

character.name: Karisawa Erika
character.description: Karisawa Erika is friends with http://anidb.net/ch13870 [Yumasaki], http://anidb.net/ch13867 [Kadota] and http://anidb.net/ch14866 [Togusa]. The quartet always hangs out together and were formerly part of http://anidb.net/ch14887 [Blue Squares] and now http://anidb.net/ch14864 [Dollars]. It was them who saved http://anidb.net/ch14873 [Saki] from the clutches of the Blue Squares.

character.name: Yumasaki Walker
character.description: Yumasaki Walker is friends with http://anidb.net/ch13869 [Karisawa], http://anidb.net/ch13867 [Kadota] and http://anidb.net/ch14866 [Togusa]. The quartet always hangs out together and were formerly part of http://anidb.net/ch14887 [Blue Squares] and now http://anidb.net/ch14864 [Dollars]. It was them who saved http://anidb.net/ch14873 [Saki] from the clutches of the Blue Squares.

character.name: Dollars
character.description: Dollars is a gang originally founded online by http://anidb.net/ch12150 [Mikado] and some of his friends. As information about them is spread by http://anidb.net/ch12153 [Izaya] the organisation rapidly gains momentum and becomes a force to be reckoned with. Some of the members include Simon, Shizuo, Kadota, Karisawa, Izaya and Selty. Note: Episode 11 reveals that http://anidb.net/ch1775 [Isaac Dian] and http://anidb.net/ch1776 [Miria Harvent] from the http://anidb.net/a4897 [Baccano!] series are also part of the gang.

character.name: Kou Kinzoku
character.description: Kou Kinzoku is one of Ikebukuro`s prominent "colour gangs". Its signal colour is yellow. The group initially consisted mostly of junior high schoolers who seeked for strength and gathered around http://anidb.net/ch12151 [Masaomi]. Although it started as a non-violent group following a conflict with the http://anidb.net/ch14887 [Blue Squares], fueled by http://anidb.net/ch12153 [Izaya] as information dealer to both sides, lead to a change in its principles. Although Masaomi quit the leadership position, the gang continued to grow after absorbing the leftover members of the Blue Squares, eventually leading into a conflict with the http://anidb.net/ch14864 [Dollars].

character.name: Togusa Saburou
character.description: Togusa Saburou is friends with http://anidb.net/ch13869 [Karisawa], http://anidb.net/ch13870 [Yumasaki] and http://anidb.net/ch13867 [Kadota]. The quartet always hangs out together and were formerly part of http://anidb.net/ch14887 [Blue Squares] and now http://anidb.net/ch14864 [Dollars]. It was them who saved http://anidb.net/ch14873 [Saki] from the clutches of the Blue Squares.

character.name: Kamichika Rio
character.description: A girl who seeks to kill herself because of family issues. She is used by Izaya in a con to lure out kidnappers working for Yagiri Pharmaceuticals and later saved by Selty. After the start of the schoolyear she ends up in Misaomi`s class at Raira Academy.

character.name: Kitakoma Shoujirou
character.description: A teacher at Raira Academy.

character.name: Yagiri Seiji
character.description: Namie`s brother. Because of the situation with their family she develops romantic feelings for him and tries everything to keep Seiji at her side, especially after he falls in love with Selty`s head that Namie shows him. After saving Anri and Mika from delinquents, Mika starts stalking him out of love, leading to her breaking into Seiji`s apartment. There she discovers Selty`s head and is smashed against a wall by him, leaving her face disfigured. Seiji stays with Mika following her plastic surgery, claiming that he found his love, and the two elope.

character.name: Kishitani Shingen
character.description: Shinra`s father and the main cause of most of the events in the story. Shortly after the birth of Shinra he comes into possession of the demon blade Saika, which he later sells to Anri`s parents who own an antique shop. During a trip to Ireland with Shinra, who was aged four at that time, he cuts off Selty`s head and sells it to Namie`s uncle, head of Yagiri Pharmaceuticals. On the way back to Japan he discovers Selty on the ship who is trying to trace her head and offers her a place to stay in exchange for letting him dissect her body. Not too long before the current day events he leaves Japan to work for Nebula Corporation in Amerika but comes back when Yagiri Pharmaceuticals is merged into Nebula.

character.name: Niekawa Haruna
character.description: The daughter of Niekawa Shuuji.

character.name: Mikajima Saki
character.description: A girl who works for Izaya. On his order she approaches Masaomi and they become a couple later leading into the events of the dispute between Kou Kinzoku and Blue Squares.

character.name: Niekawa Shuuji
character.description: A reporter who writes for the Tokyo Incidents. featuring weird events or noteworthy societies in Tokyo. Because of a planned special he comes to Ikebukuro with the intention of doing research on various topics such as who is regarded to be the strongest on the streets. He has a daughter who visits the high school.

character.name: Harima Mika
character.description: Anri`s friend from junior high school. After being saved from delinquents by Seiji she falls in love and starts stalking him. While breaking into his apartment she discovers Selty`s head and is smashed against a wall by Seiji, leaving her face disfigured. Following a plastic surgery she receives Selty`s face causing Seiji to fall in love with her and eloping together with him.

character.name: Blue Squares
character.description: Blue Squares was another prominent colour gang in Ikebukuro. Following a conflict with the http://anidb.net/ch14865 [Kou Kinzoku], fueled by http://anidb.net/ch12153 [Izaya] as information dealer to both sides, it was later absorbed by them.

character.name: Tanaka Tom
character.description: A debt collector and Shizuo`s boss.

character.name: Kazutano
character.description: An illegal immigrant. He is a friend of the otaku group around Kadota.

character.name: Hashim
character.description: Hashim is an illegal immigrant.

character.name: Hijiribe Ruri
character.description: A model and idol contracted to Densetsu Shining Corporation Ruri has many fans amongst them http://anidb.net/ch12149 [Celty], http://anidb.net/ch12154 [Shinra], http://anidb.net/ch14866 [Togusa] and a lot of Awakusu-kai members. She comes from a family whose bloodline is mixed with that of vampire and thus possesses super-human strength. Ruri is actually a serial-killer by the name Hollywood.

character.name: Heiwajima Kasuka
character.description: Shizuo`s brother. Nowadays a famous actor and model under the name Hanejima Yuuhei (羽島 幽平), he was scouted in place of his brother when he saved the talent scout from one of his outbursts of anger. After some modeling and his debut as lead actor in the film Vampire Ninja Kaamira Saizou he gained slowly popularity over the net because of his acting abilities. After an appearance in the popular show Money Gamer, where he made 1.2 billion Yen through money investments within a month, his name appeared nationwide on news reports prompting his stardom followed by a number of leading cast appearances in TV drama. Although a star excelling with a broad range of acting skills, once he is not in front of a camera it is as though he would lose any emotion and revert to a roboter-like state. But it is exactly this very nature of him, which makes him an idol amongst his many fans, who love his "cool expression".

character.name: Orihara Kururi
character.description: One of Iazaya`s sibling twin sisters who are just as every bit notorious mischief-makers as he is. They are first years at Raira Academy. Both sisters are very fond of Shizuo and his brother, Kasuka, and unlike their brother, are amongst the very few people who Shizuo rarely gets angry with.

character.name: Orihara Mairu
character.description: One of Iazaya`s sibling twin sisters who are just as every bit notorious mischief-makers as he is. They are first years at Raira Academy. Both sisters are very fond of Shizuo and his brother, Kasuka, and unlike their brother, are amongst the very few people who Shizuo rarely gets angry with.

character.name: Horada
character.description: Horada is maybe the oldest member of the Yellow Scarves. He is not much of a fighter but loves to look down on others. In front of the leader he is a coward, but he often tries to influence the group with his own ideals ignoring the leaders orders. (spoilers) Horada is actually an old member of the Blue Squares and a good friend of the blues old leader. After the gang fights between blue and yellow was over he infiltrated the Yellow Scarves with many of the old blue members. He was also the one who broke the legs of Mikajima Saki.

character.name: Yuigadokusonmaru
character.description: Yuigadokusonmaru (唯我独尊丸, Yuigadokusonmaru), often called just Dokusonmaru (独尊丸, Dokusonmaru) for short, is Kasuka Heiwajima`s cat. He is sent to live with Anri Sonohara to protect him from Kisuke Adabashi. He runs away after Kisuke attacks Anri and he is saved by Mikado Ryuugamine.

episode.title: 開口一番
First Words
Pirmi Žodžiai
Kaikou Ichiban
episode.summary: Ryuugamine Mikado, a young man longing for something special to happen in his life, moves to Ikebukuro at the invitation of his friend, Kida Masaomi. He will begin a new life, living alone, as a high school student. He arrives in Tokyo for the first time in his life. Bedazzled by this new world, Masaomi gives him a warning: "If you want to live peacefully here, stay away from Heiwajima Shizuo, Orihara Izaya, and the mysterious color gang the "Dollars." Just then, he heard a sound similar to the neigh of a horse. Mikado and Masaomi follow the sound to its source and come across what they`d thought was only an urban legend: the "Headless Rider", atop a pitch-black motorcycle... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 一虚一実
Highly Unpredictable
Stipriai nenuspėjama
Ikkyoichijitsu
episode.summary: The entrance ceremony for Raira Academy. The students` varied mix of emotions swell. As they prepare for the new journey that lays before them, some meekly introduce themselves. One says he`s quitting school even though they`ve just begun. A seat where he should be sitting sits empty. Amidst all this, Kamichika Rio is there. A girl with a dark side to her. A crack suddenly opens atop this otherwise normal world. The girl who spots this should have died two days prior. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 跳梁跋扈
Rampant Evil
Šėlsmas
Chouryoubakko
episode.summary: Masaomi is out on the town, fervently trying to pick up girls. Confused, bewildered, Mikado goes along for the ride. Out recruiting for the Russian sushi restaurant where he works is Simon Brezhnev. Also out is Heiwajima Shizuo and Tom Tanaka, out to collect on a debt they`re owed. Yagiri Seiji is feverishly searching for someone and Sonohara Anri is walking around looking for her friend who hasn`t attended a day of school since opening ceremonies. All sorts of stories intermingle in Ikebekuro as rumors of the Dollars spread. Mikado runs into his classmate, Anri, who is about to get into a fight. Thinking he`ll rescue her, he calls out to her. But then, the info broker, Orihara Izaya, who he has been warned to steer clear of, appears. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 形影相弔
Utterly Alone
Vienas, Tik su savo šešėliu
Keieisouchou
episode.summary: The people of Ikebukuro speak of an urban legend: the "Headless Rider". A surprising number have personally witnessed it, riding the streets on a jet-black bike with no license plate. A mysterious being, that appeared to be the most natural thing in the world, in the darkness and back alleys of the city. However, does anyone really know what it truly is? One man, Shinra, considers the mystery. Meanwhile, the headless rider herself wanders... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 羊頭狗肉
False Advertising
Verkiantis vynas ir Parduodamas actas
Youtoukuniku
episode.summary: Mikado, Masaomi, and Anri are enjoying a very high schooler-like afternoon, as the reporter Niekawa struggles in his search to find "The Strongest in Ikebukuro". People tell him about the Headless Rider, the Dollars, Simon, Heiwajima Shizuo, the Yellow Scarves, the Slasher. Nobody can agree. Then one of the candidates for "strongest in Ikebukuro", the Headless Rider races off with two shining red eyes, in the darkness of an alley. At the same time, a certain chat room is being trolled by a user named "SinSong". Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 東奔西走
Active Interest
Visada judesije
Touhonseisou
episode.summary: Lately, more people have been going missing between Ikebukuro and Shibuya. The ones going missing are people like runaways and illegal aliens; people who won`t be missed. And today, once again, a group of young thugs, metal pipes in hand, have broken into an abandoned hotel where illegal aliens live to go "manhunting". They call the fleeing people "materials", but then where is the "drop-off point" they speak of? And which surprising group of people stood up to save the person they captured? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 国士無双
Bad-ass Dude
Stipriausias žmogus
Kokushimusou
episode.summary: The man known as the strongest in Ikebukuro, Heiwajima Shizuo. Lately he`s been short-tempered and he doesn`t know why. His senior and partner, Tom Tanaka, tries to calm him down. Celty worries over him, but it doesn`t help. What`s bugging him? As he wanders the city to try and find out, he reflects on his past... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 南柯之夢
Ephemeral Dream
Gyvenimas - Laikinas
Nanka no Yume
episode.summary: Celty, anxious and uneasy about being unable to find her head, gets into a fight with Shinra and runs away from home. Shinra quietly awaits her return, when he is visited by a certain individual. What is their connection to Shinra, and what is their goal? At the same time, an exchange student named Shiri wanders the streets of Ikebukuro with a sketchbook and pen in hand. She asks the people she meets one question, "Hello! What are you looking for?" The people of Ikebukuro give her many different answers. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 依依恋恋
Love and Cherish
Meilė ir Branginimas
Iirenren
episode.summary: Yagiri Pharmacuticals executive Yagiri Namie was upset. She was upset because she couldn`t find her beloved brother, Seiji. To search for him, she contacts the Shinjuku information broker, Izaya. Unconcerned that he was being searched for, Seiji wanders the city of Ikebukuro with a girl with a scar around her neck. He smiles gently at her frightened insistence that they go somewhere "far away". Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 空前絶後
Never Before Seen
Pirmas ir Turbut Paskutinis
Kuuzen Zetsugo
episode.summary: Mikado bumped into a girl with a scar on her neck on a street corner. With a sense of déjà vu he hears the sound of a whinnying horse. The girl was being chased by the headless rider. He quickly decides to keep her safe, and takes her home. However, she says she has amnesia. Unsure of what to do, Mikado speaks to Masaomi, but the only conclusion they can reach is that they have to wait and see. The next day, as Mikado returns home from school, he finds the information broker Izaya and the headless rider waiting for him. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 有無相生
Yin and Yang
Buvimas ir nebuvimas Kartu egzistuoja
Umu Sousei
episode.summary: Seiji attacks Mikado to get back the girl with the scar on her neck, but the girl tells him the truth. The truth startles both him and Celty. Seiji is too shocked to move, and an infuriated Celty leaves the scene. What answer will they find in it? At the same time, a shadow approaches Mikado as he watches them toyed with by fate. It was the information broker, Izaya. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 疾風怒濤
Storm and Stress
Sturm und Drang
Shippuu Dotou
episode.summary: Anri`s missing friend, the Dullahan, the girl with the scar on her neck, Yagiri Pharmacuticals, the kidnappings, and the Dollars. The pieces are all falling into place. On a busy street in Ikebukuro, Mikado faces off with Namie. He`s afraid, but his eyes are staring straight through her soul. He`s there to reveal the truth behind the mysteries. Atop a building above them, Celty remembers Shinra`s words and asks herself: what has her reason for living been while she`s searched for her head? And then people begin to appear, one after another after another... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 急転直下
Takes a Sudden Turn
Netikėtai ir paskubintai
Kyuutenchokka
episode.summary: Six months after the big Dollars meeting, Ikebukuro has at first glance returned to normal. But below the surface, the Yellow Scarves and the Slasher are becoming more active. A shadow approaches, ready to destroy their peaceful days, as the characters are forced to face their past and present. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 物情騒然
Turmoil Reigns
Visuotinis nepasitenkinimas
Butsujou Souzen
episode.summary: Anri and several others are attacked by the slasher. Each night someone is attacked, someone called Sinsong appears on the web, writing mysterious messages. "Today. Cut. Did Cut. More. Stronger. Love. Wish. Wish. Is. Want." Mikado is bothered by the rumors that the Slasher attacks are being perpetrated by the Dollars, and asks Celty for help. Who is the Slasher and what are they after? Celty starts to get closer to the truth, but... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 愚者一得
Even a Stopped Clock Is Right Twice a Day
Netgi kvalys gali duoti patarimą
Gusha Ittoku
episode.summary: Magazine journalist Niekawa`s unbridaled passion cannot be stopped. It`s raging as strong as ever. A foreigner who runs a sushi shop, the Awakusu organization, an information broker, the Headless Rider... He investigates the supposedly strongest man in Ikebukuro, Heiwajima Shizuo, by walking around the town and talking to people. However, he is suddenly attacked! But that wasn`t the only tragedy that night... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 相思相愛
Mutual Love
Dvipusė meilė
Soushi Souai
episode.summary: Anri was the slasher`s target. Kadota and the gang happened to see her get attacked and went to save her. Shizuo and Celty joined in, and the slasher was at last defeated and his identity revealed. But their relief lasted only for a moment, as Celty is stunned at the chatroom log she says. At the same time, a certain person visits Anri when she returns home... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 有為転変
Everything Changes
Viskas Pasikeičia
Uitenpen
episode.summary: Niekawa Haruka leaves to chase Nasujima, who appeared by chance at her house. Anri follows her. As she faces off against Haruna, who`s controlling the gang of slashers, truths about her past are revealed. At the same time, Shizuo fights an unending battle against the Slashers in South Ikebukuro Park. As he defeats them one after another, his expression starts to take on a hint of joy... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 死生有命
Out of Your Control
Gyvenimas ir Mirtis yra Likimo Rankuose
Shisei Yuumei
episode.summary: Confusion is starting to descend on the town of Ikebukuro. Izaya grins with an evil smile... everything is going according to plan. Unaware of Izaya`s plan, Masaomi is remembering the past in an abandoned building. How he came back here. How a girl named Mikajima Saki still waits for him at the hospital. He remembers the words Izaya once said to him: "You can never run from your past." Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 五里霧中
Everything Covered in Fog
Pasimetimas
Gorimuchuu
episode.summary: Masaomi`s orders are ignored as the Yellow Scarves begin to hunt down members of the Dollars. Mikado is depressed when he sees a friend of his attacked at wounded, and begins to wonder if the Dollars are really needed at all. Meanwhile, Anri tries to put a stop to the gang war, but only makes things worse... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 黄天當立
A New King Will Arise
Geltonųjų dinastija - Iškils
Kouten Masa ni Tatsu
episode.summary: The headless rider, a member of the Dollars, saved someone with a katana. This fact makes the Yellow Scarves even more suspicious that the slasher is a member of the dollars. What`s more, Masaomi starts to suspect that the remnants of Blue Square, the gang he once fought, are part of it as well. He visits Kadota`s gang to find out the truth. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 蒼天已死[そうてんすでにしす]
Anarchy
Mėlynoji dinastija - Mirusi
Souten Sude ni Shisu
episode.summary: Mikado, Masaomi and Anri continue their peaceful everyday life. But Anri realizes that something is wrong with Masaomi, and tries to find out what. At the same time, a gang war starts to break out between the Yellow Scarves and Dollars over the identity of the Slasher. The standoff grows as Mikado`s desire to stop it is ignored. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 則天去私
Selfless Devotion
Įveikti save
Sokutenkyoshi
episode.summary: Filled with resolve, Masaomi burst into the abandoned factory, but there he met someone he didn`t expect. At last Masaomi, Mikado, and Anri meet. As each carryies within them inexpressible emotions, they reach an answer... What answer do they come to? And what will be the end of the Gang War that has involved so many of the people of Ikebukuro? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 千錯万綜
Complicated and Confused
Viskas susipynė
Sensaku Bansou
episode.summary: A gunshot sounds in an rainy alley, and a call comes to Masaomi. Mikado heads somewhere with Celty, and when Anri learns the truth she takes off too. In each of their hearts lie trust, doubt, and uneasy. And Izaya smiles as he enjoys the chaos. Everything rushes toward a conclusion... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 解散宣言
Declaration of Disbandment
Išsiskirstimo pranešimas
Kaisan Sengen
episode.summary: The Dollars are enraged at the evil deeds of the Yellow Scarves. While watching the member`s comments on the BBS, Mikado desperately tries to find a solution. Meanwhile, the Yellow Scarves find the identity of the girl who escaped from their hideout the night of the meeting, and come after Anri. But a surprising group of people step in to save her... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 天網恢恢
Heaven`s Vengeance
Tenmoukaikai
episode.summary: The Headless Rider receives a mysterious red bag that creates big trouble. The Yakuza chase a gangster, and a wagon disappears on the highway, pursued by suspicious men in black suits. Mikado and his friends should be enjoying the summer festival, but have been swept up in the events. And, finally, a mysterious radiant object appears in the night sky over Ikebukuro...!? Source: durararausa.com

episode.title: 天下泰平
World at Peace
Tenka Taihei
episode.summary: Life returns to normal after the largest gang fight has been squashed. Shinra tells Celty that Kasuka is Shizuo’s younger brother, Mikado and Anri; unknowingly appear on TV as potential candidates for a movie; it’s the usual occurrences for life in Ikeburuko. Source: crunchyroll
